text: Park Ridge is a borough in Bergen County, New Jersey, United States. Park Ridge had a population of 8,883 as of the 2020 United States Census. The borough is a part of the Pascack Valley region of Bergen County. It is bounded by the boroughs of Montvale, River Vale, Woodcliff Lake and Hillsdale.Areas touching Park Ridge, MapIt. Accessed January 8, 2015. The Hertz Corporation, a car rental company, had been headquartered in Park Ridge and was the borough's largest single taxpayer. Sony Corporation of America has an R&D; and engineering facility in Park Ridge.Corporate Fact Sheet, Sony Corporation of America. Accessed May 19, 2011. Famous people were either born or raised here in Park Ridge: James Gandolfini, The Roches, and Pat Nixon. ==References== Category:Boroughs in Bergen County, New Jersey
title: Park Ridge, New Jersey
